opposite_reasoning: MouseSpecies provides the strongest practical opposition for Fisher-LDA steering. While ElephantSpecies lacks a true antonym, mouse-elephant creates a clear size/scale dimension within the same taxonomic class (mammals), making it semantically coherent while maximally distant on salient features. This pairing is intuitively understood, well-represented in both ontologies, and creates a useful axis for concept manipulation. The same-class opposition reduces confounding variables (both are warm-blooded terrestrial mammals) while maximizing contrast on the target dimension (size, strength, presence).
